$interpreted: Jahan: Beasts for the arena, have we enough yet?
Royal Soldier: Sir, Sir Augustinus, we're a bit shy of the quota...
Jahan: PEASANTS! Can't even finish one simple task on time! If this hinders the ceremony's festivities,
Jahan: I assure you, it'll be no fun for you! No fun at all!
Royal Soldier: We could sure do with some leniency! There's not enough time! Please spare us and give just a few more days...
Cecil: Sir Augustinus!!
Jahan: Cecil? Didn't I send you to keep an eye on Colonel Dylan of the Sunshine Infantry?
Cecil: Yes. indeed! Not only did I learn they were the ones who stole my coins, tried to sack me as well! I'll say, Dylan has committed an act of high treason!
Cecil: You must do something on my behalf...*clears throat*...you must punish these traitors...
Jahan: Wait, what stolen coin sack?
Cecil: The coin sack our Lord bestowed upon me! The Sunshine Infantry has crossed the line!
Sione: What? It was Jahan who gave the coin sack?
Royal Soldier: Who are you? Why are you here?!
Sione: Oh no!
Jahan: Sione Aldric? What is your business?
Sione: This, I...
Cecil: Were you following me?
Cecil: Did Dylan send you?
Sione: (If Jahan was the original owner of the coin sack, I must bring him back for further questioning......)

Sione: Forgive my intrusion. Actually, Colonel Levon
offended your Security Officer some time ago.
Sione: He wouldn't wish for Sir Augustinus to press charges. I'm here to apologize on his behalf.
Jahan: Is Dylan Levon bowing down to my greatness?
Sione: Yes, sir. That is absolutely the case...
Jahan: Mwahaha~ I knew it! For better or for worse, this day has finally come! I am, after all, the superior of us both, obviously!
Sione: So will you agree to pay the Sunshine Infantry a visit?
Jahan: Hmph. On what account is it that I have to budge, and not the other way around?
Jahan: I'm in charge of the anniversary's entertainment! What if I don't make it back in time?
Sione: Colonel Levon mentioned not only will he arrange an extravagant feast for you, he will also personally escort you back to Kingdom of the Sun afterward.
Sione: Your precious time will not be wasted, I give my word.
Jahan: A huge party and parade just for me, myself, and I! Certainly that would make me a household name?
Jahan: So be it, I'm coming.
Cecil: Sir, please beware of Dylan...
Jahan: Shut your trap! Someone as smart as me would never fall for stupid mind games!
Jahan: I'm going, ALONE. You stay put and keep these soldiers in check. We must capture enough beasts for the arena, do you hear?!

I assure you, it'll be no fun for you! No fun at all!

Yes. indeed! Not only did I learn they were the ones who stole my coins, tried to sack me as well! I'll say, Dylan has committed an act of high treason!
You must do something on my behalf...*clears throat*...you must punish these traitors...
Wait, what stolen coin sack?

Who are you? Why are you here?!
Oh no!
Sione Aldric? What is your business?
This, I...
